actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Emergency Petroleum Allocation Act of 1973 to authorize and require the President of the United States to allocate asphalt and asphalt derivatives.

summary.text: Authorizes and requires the President of the United States to allocate asphalt and asphalt derivatives at specified prices to achieve an equitable distribution pursuant to the Emergency Petroleum Allocation Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Emergency Petroleum Allocation Act of 1973 to authorize and require the President of the United States to allocate asphalt and asphalt derivatives.
